mean_cn: v. 给…保险，承诺支付；同意赔款（海上保险）
mean_en: to give money to support (something, such as a new business) and agree to be responsible for any losses if it fails
sentence: Their insurance underwrites their home, so they won't lose everything in case of a fire.
sentence_trans: 他们的保险会为房子承保，所以他们不会在遭遇火灾后失去一切。
word_etyma: under在…下 + write写 → underwrite在…下面写
